name: asphyxiate
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to cause someone to be unable to breathe, usually resulting in that person's death: The murder inquiry found that the children had been asphyxiated.

to be unable to breathe, usually resulting in death, or to cause someone to be unable to breathe; suffocate: [ T ] The men were asphyxiated by smoke. asphyxiation noun [ U ] us
